head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MATHEWS, HANNAH T.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MATHEWS, HANNAH T.

block.p: MATHEWS-Hannah T. Devoted wife of the late Rabbi Dr. Morris M. Mathews for 65 years, beloved and respected matriarch of the family. Mother of Ruth and Alex Katz, Miriam and Arthur Nathan. Grandmother of Faith, Ricky, Pamela, Caryn and Ezra. Great-grandmother of Joshua, Danielle, David, Jason, Jamie, Max, Eva, Michael, Deborah, Brian, Matthew and Koby.

MATHEWS-Hannah T. Devoted wife of the late Rabbi Dr. Morris M. Mathews for 65 years, beloved and respected matriarch of the family. Mother of Ruth and Alex Katz, Miriam and Arthur Nathan. Grandmother of Faith, Ricky, Pamela, Caryn and Ezra. Great-grandmother of Joshua, Danielle, David, Jason, Jamie, Max, Eva, Michael, Deborah, Brian, Matthew and Koby.
